item.title: Idées Suspendues
item.description:
Idées Suspendues The thema is the COVID-19 pandemy, and the will to restart in full safety. But we do not want the little economy, what we call the “Real” economy to die due to this virus. The site can be reached at Idées Suspendues and this is the idea behind:
After the stores reopen, we all wonder how restaurants will be able to adapt to the new safety standards to welcome their customers again .
